page.title: 19WHITTON COURT _ WHITTON
page.content: { Whitton Court}is an attractive house, which dates from around 980. Today, it gives the impression of a typical{Elizabethan House.}It is a grade one listed building, and it can not be altered or decorated without permission. Inside, there are beautiful oak panels and beams, which are in very good condition. There are also many priceless carpets and antiques. Surrounding the house there are lawns, gardens and a large pond with a fountain. The house used to be open to the public, but now, the present owners want to keep it as a private residence. However, they have plans to turn the stables into{an Old People's Home. There will be 22 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, a dining room, a lounge and a matron to look after them.
